inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: high TSH level (13 mU/L) and low free T4 level (0.2 ng/dl)

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction, cerebrovascular event or angiography with stent placement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious infection in the month before recruitment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and was treated with Levothyroxine, symptoms improved significantly.
